picked_headlines.summary: IBM's CUGA deploys generalist agents in enterprise, emphasizing scalability and governance.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges the gap between research and practical enterprise applications, offering insights into deploying AI at scale, which is crucial for both technical and management audiences.

picked_headlines.summary: Kani TTS is a 400M TTS model achieving 5x faster than real-time on RTX 4080.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This product-focused article highlights advancements in TTS technology, appealing to engineers and stakeholders interested in practical AI applications.

digest:
- *MiniOneRec*: An open-source framework for generative recommendations using SID techniques and reinforcement learning. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24431)
- *Generative AI for Healthcare*: Transforming healthcare with data-centric systems, emphasizing quality medical data. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24551)
- *CustomIR*: Enhances dense embeddings with synthetic queries for efficient retrieval. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.21729)
- *The Structural Scalpel*: Introduces layer pruning in LLMs, reducing computational costs. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.23652)
- *Agent Data Protocol*: Unifies datasets for effective AI agent fine-tuning, boosting performance by ~20%. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24702)
- *OpenReward*: Enhances reward models for long-form tasks using external tools. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24636)
- *From Observability Data to Diagnosis*: OpsAgent enhances incident management in cloud systems. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24145)
- *Metadata-Driven Retrieval-Augmented Generation*: Improves financial question answering with contextual embeddings. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24402)
- *Serve 100 Large AI Models*: Efficient engine for quick AI model loading on a single GPU. [Read more](https://www.reddit.com/r/LocalLLaMA/comments/1oixju1/serve_100_large_ai_models_on_a_single_gpu_with/)
- *Agentic AI and Security*: Discusses security risks of agentic AI due to LLMs' instruction-data separation challenges. [Read more](https://martinfowler.com/articles/agentic-ai-security.html)
